00460 
00461 template <class IF>
00462 inline
00463 IF*
00464 sc_port_b<IF>::operator -> ()
00465 {
00466     if( m_interface == 0 ) {
00467         report_error( SC_ID_GET_IF_, "port is not bound" );
00468         sc_core::sc_abort(); // can't recover from here
00469     }
00470     return m_interface;
00471 }
00472 
00473 template <class IF>
00474 inline
00475 const IF*
00476 sc_port_b<IF>::operator -> () const
00477 {
00478     // delegate implementation to non-const overload
00479     return const_cast<sc_port_b&>(*this).operator->();
00480 }
00481 
00482 
00483 // allow to call methods provided by interface at index
00484 //
00485 // note that we special-case index of zero, since the method may be
00486 // called before binding has occurred, and we need to return a zero
00487 // in that case not an error.
00488 
00489 template <class IF>
00490 inline
00491 IF*
00492 sc_port_b<IF>::get_interface( int index_ )
00493 {
00494     if ( index_ == 0 ) {
00495         return m_interface;
00496     }
00497     else if( index_ < 0 || index_ >= size() ) {
00498         report_error( SC_ID_GET_IF_, "index out of range" );
00499         return NULL;
00500     }
00501     return m_interface_vec[index_];
00502 }
00503 
00504 template <class IF>
00505 inline
00506 const IF*
00507 sc_port_b<IF>::get_interface( int index_ ) const
00508 {
00509     // delegate implementation to non-const overload
00510     return const_cast<sc_port_b&>(*this).get_interface(index_);
00511 }

00514 // called by pbind (for internal use only)
00515 
00516 template <class IF>
00517 inline
00518 int
00519 sc_port_b<IF>::vbind( sc_interface& interface_ )
00520 {
00521     IF* iface = dynamic_cast<IF*>( &interface_ );
00522     if( iface == 0 ) {
00523         // type mismatch
00524         return 2;
00525     }
00526     base_type::bind( *iface );
00527     return 0;
00528 }
00529 
00530 template <class IF>
00531 inline
00532 int
00533 sc_port_b<IF>::vbind( sc_port_base& parent_ )
00534 {
00535     this_type* parent = dynamic_cast<this_type*>( &parent_ );
00536     if( parent == 0 ) {
00537         // type mismatch
00538         return 2;
00539     }
00540     base_type::bind( *parent );
00541     return 0;
00542 }
00543 
00544 
00545 // called by complete_binding (for internal use only)
00546 
00547 template <class IF>
00548 inline
00549 void
00550 sc_port_b<IF>::add_interface( sc_interface* interface_ )
00551 {
00552     IF* iface = dynamic_cast<IF*>( interface_ );
00553     sc_assert( iface != 0 );
00554 
00555     // make sure that the interface is not already bound:
00556 
00557     int if_n = size();
00558     for ( int i = 0; i < if_n; i++ )
00559     {
00560         if ( iface == m_interface_vec[i] )
00561         {
00562             report_error( SC_ID_BIND_IF_TO_PORT_,
00563                           "interface already bound to port" );
00564             // may continue, if suppressed
00565         }
00566     }
00567 
00568     // "bind" the interface and make sure our short cut for 0 is set up.
00569 
00570     m_interface_vec.push_back( iface );
00571     m_interface = m_interface_vec[0];
00572 }
00573 
00574 template <class IF>
00575 inline
00576 sc_type_index
00577 sc_port_b<IF>::get_interface_type() const
00578 {
00579     return typeid( IF );
00580 }
00581 
00582 template <class IF>
00583 inline
00584 int
00585 sc_port_b<IF>::interface_count() const
00586 {
00587     return size();
00588 }

00590 template <class IF>
00591 void
00592 sc_port_b<IF>::make_sensitive( sc_thread_handle handle_p,
00593                   sc_event_finder* event_finder_ ) const
00594 {
00595     if ( m_bind_info == 0 )
00596     {
00597         int if_n = size();
00598         for ( int if_i = 0; if_i < if_n; if_i++ )
00599         {
00600             IF* iface_p = m_interface_vec[if_i];
00601             sc_assert( iface_p != 0 );
00602             add_static_event( handle_p, iface_p->default_event() );
00603         }
00604     }
00605     else
00606     {
00607         sc_port_base::make_sensitive( handle_p, event_finder_ );
00608     }
00609 }
00610 
00611 template <class IF>
00612 void
00613 sc_port_b<IF>::make_sensitive( sc_method_handle handle_p,
00614                   sc_event_finder* event_finder_ ) const
00615 {
00616     if ( m_bind_info == 0 )
00617     {
00618         int if_n = size();
00619         for ( int if_i = 0; if_i < if_n; if_i++ )
00620         {
00621             IF* iface_p = m_interface_vec[if_i];
00622             sc_assert( iface_p != 0 );
00623             add_static_event( handle_p, iface_p->default_event() );
00624         }
00625     }
00626     else
00627     {
00628         sc_port_base::make_sensitive( handle_p, event_finder_ );
00629     }
00630 }
